view

Class ViewFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.ViewFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyListener, Runnable, EventListener, IViewFacade

    public class ViewFacade
extends Object
implements IViewFacade, Runnable, KeyListener

    The Class ViewFacade provides a facade of the View component.

    1.0
